game.title: Gummy Pop
game.description:
STOP MATCHING and START POPPING! Pop the adorable GUMMIES to create incredible Chain Reactions!
Download Now and enjoy the crazy chain reactions, super-fun power-ups, amazing level variations and incredible popping fun across hundreds of poptastic levels!
game.features: Unique and Exciting Chain Reaction Mechanic: An interesting new take on chain reaction mechanic: Grow Gummies - Pop Gummies - Create amazing chain reactions. Amazing Power Ups to help you in sticky situations: 9 awesome powerups to choose from, select the powerup that suits your gameplay style. Adorable Characters that you'll love: Four different gummies that grow from the sleepy Green gummy to the active Red gummy. 5 distinct game variations: Never run out of fun with 5 different game variations. Keep an eye out for the interesting challenges. 280 Challenging Levels: Play all 280 levels along your journey across 5 different worlds. Deceptively Simple and Incredibly Fun Gameplay : Strategize to form clusters of red gummies, the bigger the clusters, the better the Chain reactions Captivating Music and Sound: Enjoy your journey across the mystery lands with awesome music to keep you entertained. Compete with friends for high scores : Challenge your friends, beat them by saving more gummies, compete on global leaderboards and be the Poppin’ champ. Play across multiple devices without losing progress: Sync with facebook and save your progress across all platforms, including Android, iOS and Amazon.
